name: Cunt Wars
description:
Cunt Wars is an erotic game in 18+ format. A hot combination of vulgar anime and turn-based RPG with the most charming girls. High-quality graphics and gameplay will definitely give you pleasure.
Despite the "vulgar" content, Cunt Wars has a pretty good strategic component. You have to take control of the squad, collect a whole collection of special cards, which will need to be improved later. And of course, in our hands will be the fate of the real hero, whom we will pump. As for the content of 18+, the ladies here will definitely not give you rest with their "talents". Try it definitely.
